info.name: Trackit API
info.description:
Trackit is a lightweight task and schedule management system designed for anyone who wants to stay on top of their daily responsibilities. Whether you're managing work assignments, personal routines, or hobbies, this API helps you organize tasks into projects, set deadlines, and gain clear calendar-based overviews for efficient follow-up.


Contact Support:
 Name: Trackit Support
 Email: support@trackit.example.com

request.description: Creates a new user account using email and password credentials.
Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token if credentials are valid.
Uploads a new profile image for the authenticated user.
Returns the profile information of the authenticated user.
Updates the authenticated user's profile (name and nickname).

item.name: Create a New Task in a Project

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Finish outline for new novel",
  "description": "Initial draft of chapter structure",
  "dueDate": "2025-04-20T18:00:00Z",
  "status": "not-started",
  "priority": "high"
}

request.description: Creates a new task under the specified project.

response.name: Create Task – 201 Created

request.description: Retrieves a list of tasks under the specified project. The response will include only tasks belonging to the specified `projectId`. The example shown includes task from all defined projects (proj_001 to proj_005) for demonstration purposes.

response.name: Get Tasks – 200 OK
response.body:
{

        "code": 200,
        "message": "Tasks retrieved successfully."

    "data": [

request.description: Retrieves all tasks belonging to the authenticated user, optionally filtered by date range, status, or project. Useful for building a calendar or dashboard overview of scheduled tasks.

response.name: Overview – 200 OK

query.description: (Required) Start date for filtering tasks (ISO 8601 format)
End date for filtering tasks (ISO 8601 format)
